text_lines: You place the §lWaffle Iron§r™ down like any other block. When placed it will face the player that placed it.
The §lWaffle Iron§r™ can also be placed diagonally, so it fits nicely into corners as well.
Once placed you can start to operate the apparatus. Right-clicking the §lWaffle Iron§r™ while sneaking will open and close the §lWaffle Iron§r™
